prodNameC: 伯樂亞 麴菌屬半乳糖甘露聚糖抗原(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
Microplate: EBA-2 anti-galactomannan monoclonal antibody
Concentrated washing solution (10X): TRIS-NaCl buffer (pH 7.4), 1% Tween 20 Preservative: 0.01% de thimerosal
Negative control serum: Human control serum not containing galactomannan.
Calibrator serum: Human serum containing galactomannan (1 ng/ml).
Positive control serum: Human serum containing galactomannan.
Conjugate: Peroxidase-labelled anti-galactomannan monoclonal antibody.
Serum treatment solution: EDTA acid solution.
TMB substrate buffer: Citric acid and sodium acetate solution pH 5.2 containing 0.009% H2O2 and 4% Dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO)
Chromogen TMB solution: 90% DMSO solution containing 0.6% Tetramethylbenzidine (TMB)
Stopping solution: 1.5 N sulphuric acid.
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 測定人體血清中Aspergillus galactomannan Antigen。
mdFormat: 空白（依本署95年4月14日衛署藥字第0950311929號公告辦理，第一等級醫療器材查驗登記審查，不登錄產品型號）。
